body.name: Aeropress Clear Coffee Press – 3 in 1 brew method combines French Press, Pourover, Espresso - Full bodied coffee without grit or bitterness - Small portable coffee maker for camping & travel
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 8 hrs 20 mins
features: CRYSTAL CLEAR, SHATTERPROOF TRITAN: Our iconic coffee press, now made with the same patented technology. Cool enough for display, tough enough for the road.

UNIQUELY DELICIOUS: No more average joe from fancy, expensive machines. By combining the best of several brew methods into one patented device, you get smooth, rich, grit-free coffee with a delicious, full-bodied finish that lingers well after your last sip. No bitterness. No cream needed.​

PATENTED 3-IN-1 BREW TECHNOLOGY: The only press that combines agitation and pressure with micro-filtration so you can use finer ground coffee. Hot water is pushed through the grinds, quickly aerating and extracting only the purest, freshest flavors, while keeping grit and bitterness out of your coffee.

BETTER THAN FRENCH PRESS: No more bitterness or grit. The patented 3-in-1 brew technology of the AeroPress Clear Coffee maker eliminates bitterness and acidity and creates a smooth, rich, full bodied cup of coffee. Paper or metal micro-filters allow you to use finer ground coffee for a faster brew time and no grit (unlike the mesh filter of a French press). No more messy coffee grounds – clean-up takes seconds! Durable, shatterproof design, perfect for travel, camping & gifting.

TRAVEL AND GIFT READY: Compact, durable, shatterproof and lightweight. Pack it in your bag and take it on the road. No more mediocre (at best) hotel or office coffee. And promising a totally original coffee experience, our little coffee innovation is a gift that almost guarantees a smile and a hug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than french press or Bialetti
reviews.reviewText: The title says - this is such a great product. So easy to use, so easy to clean and most importantly a great cup of coffee. An easy 5 star.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Getting rid of my 4 cup coffee maker!
reviews.reviewText: I bought the Aeropress to brew cacao, and it did a great job. The brew was rich and flavorful, but I am really a coffee drinker. When I finally got around to making my first cup, I noticed it looked different, it seemed thicker and richer. After I fixed it to my liking, I took a sip. OMG! Totally blew my mind! I have never tasted so much flavor in a sip of coffee, I didn't know all of those flavors were there, and so smooth! Between the first and second sip, I ordered another one for my brother in law, the other coffee drinker in the family. I gave him a few days and then I called him to see how he liked it. We both came to the same conclusion: time to get rid of the coffee maker and the French press!What I like about it: makes amazing coffee and coffee drinks, love the metal reusable filter, and the quick and easy clean up.What I don't like about it: haven't figured that out yet!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome coffee maker!
reviews.reviewText: This device is pretty much a modern day French press. It makes some awesome tasting coffee in just a few minutes and is really, really easy to clean. Plus it’s small so it’s not taking up a lot of storage in the kitchen cabinet. Would highly recommend as a gift to any coffee lover in your life!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This AeroPress replaces the smoky gray version that I wore out during years of daily use. (The piston’s rubber “foot” had gradually lost its sealing ability, allowing coffee to blow by.) I love the convenience that AeroPress lends to my morning routine. My coffee is ready in a jiffy, and cleanup takes about half a minute. I especially like the glossy hard, crystal clear, high performance polymer! Just one caution: do not over-tighten the filter cap when mating it to the cylinder or you’ll need a jar opener tool to remove it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So fun and perfect for travel
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought this to take on a mission trip, but have loved using it at home almost daily. It’s super easy to clean, very user friendly, and I love the clear version. I almost didn’t pay the extra money for the clear vs the original but I am so glad that I did. This is becoming a huge staple for me in terms of my coffee setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easiest clean-up ever!
reviews.reviewText: First I want to say that even tho I bought this on Amazon, I first heard about it on a That Dude Can Cook YouTube video.This has made my mornings so much better. I have coffee first thing every morning. I’m not a morning person so I’m never at my best when I first get up. Some days the promise of my one guiltless pleasure is the only way I’m able to convince myself it’s worth getting out of bed. However, I’ve had trouble finding a smooth and rapid way to that first sip. I’ve been using a French press but hate the clean up. It feels like coffee grounds get everywhere. And you can’t wash them down the sink as they are bad for the pipes. Recently we had to have 8 feet of pipe replaced due to one very long clog. Now we are very careful about what goes in the garbage disposal.Now I’m able to pop the grounds into the garbage can in one swift move and boom I’m ready to make my next cup.I do think the coffee tastes better now. Maybe it’s just in my head - a placebo effect if you will. But it really does make good coffee and in less time. I don’t know how but it seems they’ve found a way to get more flavor out of the grounds in less time.Thanks that dude that can cook for telling me about this great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Wanted a coffee maker that I could take on trips. This is good for that however in order to get a good cup of coffee you need to add a lot of coffee. It is easy to use once you get the hang of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks basic but really powerful
reviews.reviewText: The AeroPress has changed how I look at coffee. Makes it really easy to have a great home brewed coffee. It turned coffee into a new hobby for me.
El aparato hace un café excelente, una lástima que la caja haya llegado reventada. Pensaba regalar uno a otra persona pero si llega en este estado tengo mis dudas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I came across the Aeropress years ago when a friend demonstrated his, but I never bought one before because I have a Nespresso machine. Fast forward to this week and I’m on holiday in a caravan so finally bought an Aeropress so I can have decent coffee here.Decent coffee is an understatement, the Aeropress makes exceptional coffee. It’s very easy to use, it takes a couple of minutes to make a coffee, and cleaning it is as simple as rinsing it under a tap. The coffee it produces is smooth and tasty without any hint of bitterness, and you can have Americanos, Lattes or any other style… it doesn’t make Espressos as such, as you need high pressure for them, but they’re as close to espresso as it’s possible to get without actually being espresso, there’s very little difference at all. The blurb on the box is careful to call it espresso style coffee!Your first cup of coffee from the Aeropress will taste great, but mastering it will only come in time given the myriad of variables possible: amount of coffee, amount of water, temperature of water, steeping time, number of stirs, pressure applied to plunger and so on - a search on YouTube reveals hundreds of videos claiming the formula for the perfect cup of coffee, heck there’s even an annual World Championship for the best coffee produced with Aeropress!Another fantastic thing about the Aeropress is the price - it’s highly inexpensive given the quality of coffee it produces, and the fact that its inventor has 40 patents related to its construction. It looks deceptively simple, but it’s very clever really.It’s now got me into coffee in a big way - I thought I was into it before, but now I can’t wait to get home and buy a gooseneck kettle for more even pressure of water pouring onto the coffee grounds, a manual grinder to ensure the correct consistency of the coffee grounds , and fresh coffee beans to grind myself - all to see how close to the perfect cup of coffee I can get!I’m prepared to bet that, if you buy an Aeropress, you will be AeroIMpressed by the top notch coffee it helps produce, and I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend it to any coffee drinker - you’ll not look back!A very easy two thumbs up 👍🏻👍🏻
Easy to learn how to use and makes a great cup of coffee!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the fact that the aeropress is super quick and easy to use, making the strong coffee we like, (albeit without a crema).We also like that it's so easy to clean. When you've finished, the compressed coffee "puck" is easily disposded of. We'll definitely take it with us when travelling.
